Posts.Content: Hi  I had my left breast removed four weeks ago and had a reconstruction with an expander implant. I had my drains for 3 weeks. My breast is so sore and and hoping that it goes down in size as it feels hard and goes very tight. Is this normal, I told a different consultant who didn’t seemed worried. I’m frustrated as I’m such an active person working outside doing manual work. How long till I can at least drive??? Would love to hear from others xx
Posts.Title: Recovery four weeks after op

Posts.Content: Hi Carolyn  Thankyou for your reply I guess I may be just impatient, I forgot to add to my blog that I had my op on a Tuesday and left hospital on the Thursday but in the Sunday was back in with a severe infection with white blisters all over my boob.  Came home after 5 days of drips and then blow me picked up a virus 2 days later and was back at the doctors. So maybe after what’s been thrown at me I actually ok?? !!  Sandie x
